content: OTTAWA A possible bid for BlackBerry Ltd by South Korea's Samsung Electronics Co Ltd would be unlikely to raise Canadian government security concerns  sources familiar with Ottawa's thinking said on Wednesday.
name: BlackBerry Limited
title: South Korean BlackBerry bid not seen raising Canadian concerns

content: OTTAWA  Jan 14 A possible bid for BlackBerry Ltd   by South Korea's Samsung Electronics Co Ltd  would be unlikely to raise Canadian government security concerns  sources familiar with Ottawa's thinking said on Wednesday.
name: BlackBerry Limited
title: UPDATE 1-S.Korean BlackBerry bid not seen raising Canadian concerns

content: NEW YORK  Jan 14 Options activity in BlackBerry Ltd jumped after a Reuters report that Samsung Electronics Co Ltd had approached the Canadian company about a possible takeover deal.
name: BlackBerry Limited
title: BlackBerry options activity surges on Samsung approach report

content: SEOUL  Jan 15 South Korea's Samsung Electronics Co Ltd has denied that it made an offer to acquire Canada's BlackBerry Ltd and has no plans to do so  South Korea's Yonhap News Agency reported on Thursday.
name: BlackBerry Limited
title: Samsung Elec says not seeking to acquire Blackberry - Yonhap

content: OTTAWA  Jan 14 A spokesman for Canadian Prime Minister Stephen Harper on Wednesday declined to comment on a Reuters report that said Samsung Electronics Co Ltd  had approached BlackBerry about a buyout.
name: BlackBerry Limited
title: Canada PM's office won't comment on reported Samsung bid for BlackBerry
